name: Routing Policy
description: Policy-driven model routing, task classification, and composable prompt pipeline.

classifierModel.label: Classifier Model
classifierModel.help: Model used for LLM-based classification when heuristic confidence is low (default: gpt-4.1-mini)

heuristicConfidenceThreshold.label: Heuristic Confidence Threshold
heuristicConfidenceThreshold.help: Minimum heuristic confidence before falling back to LLM classifier (default: 0.7)

policyFile.label: Policy File
policyFile.help: Filename for routing policies in stateDir (default: routing-policies.json)

contributorsFile.label: Contributors File
contributorsFile.help: Filename for prompt contributors in stateDir (default: prompt-contributors.json)

defaultModel.label: Default Model
defaultModel.help: Model to use when no routing policy matches (empty = use agent's configured model)
